description: Be True is a course designed to determine what your Core Value System is. These instructional videos will help you discover what your core values are and will support you in aligning with what matters most in your life. Along with the downloadable worksheets this course will assists you in better decision making, living a life of integrity, and being a more truer version of yourself. Take 25 minutes, download the handouts, follow the tutorials and explore a piece of yourself you may not have know even existed.
title: Be True: Find Your Truth And Live It!
